moreBlocks.articles:
• Our Criminal Defense Practice
    Our experienced lawyers use all appropriate legal measures in protecting your rights and seek to obtain the best possible results on your behalf. We are well-versed in the courtroom and have successfully handled many cases in litigation.
  • Our Personal Injury Practice
    Martin & Wallentine provides high quality legal representation to victims in serious injury cases in Kansas City and throughout Kansas and Missouri.
  • Our DUI Defense Practice
    Those who are facing the legal consequences of a DUI arrest should act quickly and contact an experienced and successful Kansas DUI attorney. Our firm focuses on DUI defense and has an impressive record in court.

    Keep up to date with DUI issues and our firm.

description:
At the Law Firm of Martin & Wallentine, LLC in Kansas City, Missouri, we are dedicated to providing the zealous advocacy you need to obtain justice in your personal injury case. Our experienced attorneys focus on all types of serious and fatal accidents, including car accidents caused by drunk driving, texting while driving and fatigued driving. We are also well versed in medical malpractice matters.

No matter your situation, you can rest assured that we will aggressively pursue the maximum settlement you may be entitled to. Our lawyers know that when you have experienced physical pain and suffering, there can be no substitute for solid representation. We have a track record of success and will work hard to obtain the best possible outcome in your case.

The attorneys with the Law Firm of Martin & Wallentine, LLC will never stop fighting for you. We know that facing the consequences of another's negligence can be crippling in many ways. A personal injury leaves not only physical scars, but emotional and financial ones as well. That is why we work closely with all our clients to explore every avenue of legal recourse.

Our attorneys are committed to maintaining a small caseload so that we can always give you the one-on-one attention you deserve. Your comfort is one of our highest priorities. We offer free initial consultations and will visit you at home or in the hospital.
